```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# setup chunks
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, fig.align = "center", warning = F, message = F)
# load libaries
library(tidyverse)
library(grid)
library(patchwork)
library(ISLR)
# load helper scripts
source(file = "R/wrangle.R")
source(file = "R/filter.R")
source(file = "R/visualization.R")
```

```{r}
# load rookies datasets
df_pit_rkes <- read_csv("data/rookie-pitchers.csv")
df_pos_rkes <- read_csv("data/rookie-positions.csv")
# load retired datasets
df_pit_ret <- read_csv("data/retired-pitchers.csv")
df_pos_ret <- read_csv("data/retired-positions.csv")
```

```{r}
# get wrnagled datasets
pit_rkes <- wrangle_(df_pit_rkes)
pos_rkes <- wrangle_(df_pos_rkes)
pit_ret <- wrangle_(df_pit_ret)
pos_ret <- wrangle_(df_pos_ret)
# get summaries
pit_rkes_summary <- summary_(pit_rkes)
pos_rkes_summary <- summary_(pos_rkes)
pit_ret_summary <- summary_(pit_rkes)
pos_ret_summary <- summary_(pit_rkes)
```

```{r}
# get summaries
pit_rkes_summary <- pit_rkes_summary %>% select(Year, threshold)
pos_rkes_summary <- pos_rkes_summary %>% select(Year, threshold)
pit_ret_summary <- pit_ret_summary %>% select(Year, threshold)
pos_ret_summary <- pos_ret_summary %>% select(Year, threshold)
```

```{r}
#=================
# POSITION PLAYERS
#=================
# check which players cross that year's threshold
pit_ret <- append_thresholds(pit_ret, pit_rkes_summary)
colnames(pit_ret)[3] <- "above_mean_threshold"
# check which players cross that year's threshold
pos_ret <- append_thresholds(pos_ret, pos_rkes_summary)
colnames(pos_ret)[3] <- "above_mean_threshold"
```

```{r}
cbns_retired_mean <- count(pos_ret,above_mean_threshold)
# normalize
cbns_retired_mean[,2] <- cbns_retired_mean[,2]/sum(cbns_retired_mean$n)
```

```{r}
cbns_pitchers <- count_cbns(pit_ret)
cbns_position <- count_cbns(pos_ret)
```

```{r}
model_year <- lm(formula = count_cbns_mean ~ Year, data = cbns_pitchers)
summary(model_year)
```
